short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of your time spent on distracting websites and get alerted when you've exceeded your allowance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your settings to limit your access and increase productivity. Choose the websites you want to monitor and set the time constraints you'd like. Simple, unobtrusive, and effective.
